docs.lead_paragraph: From hand-colored photographs of the holy land to paintings of outer space commissioned by NASA.
docs.snippet: From hand-colored photographs of the holy land to paintings of outer space commissioned by NASA.

docs.lead_paragraph: A few weeks ago, I was in San Francisco, having dinner at a restaurant called Café Gratitude, which serves food that is vegan, gluten-free and raw. Each dish is named with an affirmation ("I Am Sensational" is the pesto pizza, made with buckwheat sunflower seed flatbread crust; "I Am Thankful," coconut-curry soup), and you must say them aloud when you order. When I asked for an "I Am Sassy" -- sort of like a lemonade -- my sweet-eyed waiter responded "You are sassy!" as a way of both acknowledging my order and confirming my essential sassiness.

headline.main: How to Cook. . . Something: Braised Tofu

docs.abstract: A trip to California inspires a meal based on that staple of vegetarian cooking: tofu.
docs.snippet: A trip to California inspires a meal based on that staple of vegetarian cooking: tofu.

docs.lead_paragraph: Exercise during pregnancy may help women reduce the need for anesthesia when they give birth, a small study has found.

headline.main: Having a Baby: Exercise May Reduce Need for an Epidural
headline.print_headline: Exercise May Reduce Need for an Epidural
